headline.print_headline: Tropical Storm Debby Exits a Rain-Soaked Florida
headline.seo: Tropical Storm Debby Exits Rain-Soaked Florida
headline.main: Tropical Storm Debby Exits a Rain-Soaked Florida

docs.snippet: Debby pounded Florida with relentless rain for four days, but by the time the storm reached the Atlantic Ocean, it had been downgraded to a tropical depression....
docs.abstract: Tropical storm Debby exits Florida, leaving behind a trail of damaged homes and flooded roads.
docs.lead_paragraph: Debby pounded Florida with relentless rain for four days, but by the time the storm reached the Atlantic Ocean, it had been downgraded to a tropical depression.

headline.print_headline: Under a Ranting Elmo’s Mask, A Man With a Disturbing Past
headline.seo: Beneath Elmo’s Mask, a Man With a Disturbing Past
headline.main: Beneath a Ranting Elmo’s Mask, a Man With a Disturbing Past

docs.snippet: A man in an Elmo costume who was handcuffed after he went on an obscene, anti-Semitic tirade in Central Park once operated a pornographic Web site in Cambodia....
docs.abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on brouhaha surrounding obscene tirade by man wearing an Elmo costume outside Central Park; incident underscores dark side of unregulated industry in which people dress as children's characters in tourist-clogged areas for money.
docs.lead_paragraph: A man in an Elmo costume who was handcuffed after he went on an obscene, anti-Semitic tirade in Central Park once operated a pornographic Web site in Cambodia.

headline.print_headline: Awaiting Ruling on Fairly Simple Questions About a Complex Health Law
headline.sub: Awaiting Ruling on Fairly Simple Questions
headline.seo: Ruling Expected on Health Care Law
headline.main: Awaiting Ruling on Fairly Simple Questions About a Complex Health Law

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court’s expected decision Thursday on the health care overhaul that President Obama signed into law in 2010 could affect nearly every American from cradle to grave....

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Supreme Court's highly-anticipated decision on the Affordable Care Act is likely to turn on a narrow set of specific constitutional questions; chief issue remains whether or not Congress overstepped its powers by requiring virtually all Americans to obtain health insurance or pay a penalty.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court’s expected decision Thursday on the health care overhaul that President Obama signed into law in 2010 could affect nearly every American from cradle to grave.

docs.snippet: Larry Bird, perhaps the most respected and beloved basketball figure in a state obsessed with the sport, will leave his job as the Indiana Pacers’ president of basketball operations at the end of August....

headline.print_headline: In Retail, Manhattan Outstrips Rest of City
headline.seo: Manhattan Outstrips Other Boroughs as Shopping Hub
headline.main: As Retail Hub, Manhattan Tops National Average and Outstrips Other Boroughs

docs.snippet: The retail success in Manhattan, fueled by an influx of tourists, has forced residents of other boroughs to travel far for staples or rely on shops like drugstores....
docs.abstract: Success of retails stores in Manhattan is not duplicated in the city's other four boroughs, where many residents are forced to to travel into Manhattan or outside the city to shop for groceries and staples at discount prices.
docs.lead_paragraph: The retail success in Manhattan, fueled by an influx of tourists, has forced residents of other boroughs to travel far for staples or rely on shops like drugstores.
